abstract: Pentagon says Chinese fighter jet conducted unsafe maneuver close to American spy plane, second time in over year; maneuver called barrel roll, was completed as it flew 80 miles east of Shandong Peninsula in Yellow Sea.
lead_paragraph: The episode occurred Sept. 15 about 80 miles east of the Shandong Peninsula in the Yellow Sea when a Chinese fighter jet passed in front of an American RC-135 reconnaissance plane in an unsafe way.

headline.main: Pentagon Says Chinese Pilot Flew Too Close to U.S. Spy Plane
headline.print_headline: Pentagon Says Chinese Pilot Flew Too Close to Spy Plane

snippet: The episode occurred Sept. 15 about 80 miles east of the Shandong Peninsula in the Yellow Sea when a Chinese fighter jet passed in front of an American RC-135 reconnaissance plane in an unsafe way.
